remarks: The (signed) angle between two vectors is the argument of their quotient.  Deduction form of ~ angval .  (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
statement:
ang.1 $e |- F = ( x e. ( CC \ { 0 } ) , y e. ( CC \ { 0 } ) |-> ( Im ` ( log ` ( y / x ) ) ) ) $.
angvald.1 $e |- ( ph -> X e. CC ) $.
angvald.2 $e |- ( ph -> X =/= 0 ) $.
angvald.3 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. CC ) $.
angvald.4 $e |- ( ph -> Y =/= 0 ) $.
angvald $p |- ( ph -> ( X F Y ) = ( Im ` ( log ` ( Y / X ) ) ) ) $.
$d X x y $.
$d Y x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
